title: Design and Operational Strategies for Remote Education Student Support Services

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental distance education concepts and basic smartphone proficiency
context.additional_context: A course cultivating the ability to design remote education support services via PBL (Project-Based Learning) in smartphone-based constrained environments, requiring tailored designs considering learner roles (students/job seekers) and novice expertise levels.

learning_goals: Learners can identify core components of learner support services in a distance education environment
Learners can complete a project analyzing learner requirements using mixed research methods (literature analysis/interviews/observation)
Learners can design support strategies feasible in smartphone-based constrained environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
